content: i wanted to create something for halloween that was little bit different from all i see online and especially with no sewing involved so i went for a spider granny square i started with the spider applique available at this link 1 and then i joined other yarn to create the granny square you give space to your creativity and using the colours you prefer and also adding details like eyes or spiderwebs etc 1 https //elendipity com/index php/2022/09/16/spider-crochet-applique/
